short_description: According to the assessment conducted by EFSA’s expert panel, the safety of the NF synthetic CBD cannot be established.
long_description: According to the assessment conducted by EFSA’s expert panel, the safety of the NF synthetic CBD cannot be established. This partnership marks a significant step in enhancing regulatory support and digital solutions for businesses navigating complex compliance requirements. 2025-02-21 CIRS Japan Formally Established in Tokyo CIRS Japan Formally Established in Tokyo On January 22, 2025, CIRS Japan (Japanese name: CIRSジャパン株式会社) was officially established in Tokyo.
